content.question: According to the passage, which of the following might be a result of the 2012 election in Mexico?

choices.label: The PRI will be able to easily pass legislation without compromising.
A member of PAN will likely be appointed vice president to ensure cooperation with the PRI.
The PRI will use its majority to pass a constitutional amendment to reduce poverty.
The PRI will have to compromise with PAN, the opposition party, to pass legislation.

content.answer: The PRI will have to compromise with PAN, the opposition party, to pass legislation.
